DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey Six Month Prior Child Diagnosis Used Cooking Stove to Heat Home Because Bills Not Paid Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether, in the 6 months before their childÂ’s diagnosis, a person had to use a cooking stove to heat their home because bills could not be paid.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Six Month Prior Child Diagnosis Used Cooking Stove to Heat Home Because Bills Not Paid
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Earlier in time or order._A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A question about whether an individual used a cooking stove to heat their home because they did not pay the bills.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.:A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

Concepts.definition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

Property.preferredName: Six Month Prior Child Diagnosis Used Cooking Stove to Heat Home Because Bills Not Paid
Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Earlier in time or order.:A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:A question about whether an individual used a cooking stove to heat their home because they did not pay the bills.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.longName: Used Cooking Stove to Heat Home Because Bills Not Paid
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual used a cooking stove to heat their home because they did not pay the bills.
